abstract: A Minneapolis food writer says the Twitter humorist was definitely at a conference she attended on Wednesday, as was the Village Voice restaurant critic.
snippet: A Minneapolis food writer says the Twitter humorist was definitely at a conference she attended on Wednesday, as was the Village Voice restaurant critic.
lead_paragraph: Lee Svitak Dean, editor of the Taste section of The Minneapolis Star-Tribune, was listening to Matt and Ted Lee give the keynote address at the annual meeting of the Association of Food Journalists on Wednesday when someone asked the brothers what they thought of Ruth Bourdain's winning a humor writing award from the James Beard Foundation in May.
